// client/src/components/About.jsx import React from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const About = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const team = [ { name: "Thomas MÃ¼ller", role: "CEO & Founder", img: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1607746882042-944635dfe10e?auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80", bio: "With over 15 years of experience in German real estate, Thomas founded Hausgold to create a more transparent and user-friendly property market.", }, { name: "Sarah Becker", role: "CTO", img: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1544723795-3fb6469f5b39?auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80", bio: "Sarah leads our technology team, ensuring our platform is secure, reliable, and constantly evolving to meet our users' needs.", }, { name: "Michael Wagner", role: "Head of Operations", img: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1603415526960-f7e0328e3d4f?auto=format&fit=crop&w=600&q=80", bio: "Michael ensures our day-to-day operations run smoothly, from customer service to property verification and listing management.", }, ]; const values = [ { title: "Trust & Security", desc: "We verify all properties and users to ensure a safe and trustworthy experience for everyone on our platform.", icon: ( ), }, { title: "Transparency", desc: "No hidden fees, no misleading information. We believe in complete transparency in all our transactions.", icon: ( <> ), }, { title: "Innovation", desc: "We continuously improve our platform with cutting-edge technology to provide the best user experience possible.", icon: ( <> ), }, { title: "Customer Focus", desc: "Our customers are at the heart of everything we do. We're committed to providing exceptional service and support.", icon: ( <> ), }, ]; return (
{/* Header */}

About Hausgold

Germanyâs most trusted real estate platform, connecting buyers, renters, and sellers since 2025.

{/* Mission */}

Our Mission

At Hausgold, we're revolutionizing the German real estate market by providing a transparent, user friendly platform that connects property seekers with their perfect homes.

We believe everyone deserves to find their ideal property without the stress and complexity traditionally associated with real estate transactions.

Our commitment to security, transparency, and exceptional customer service sets us apart in the industry.

{/* Team */}

Our Leadership Team

{member.role}

{member.bio}

))}
{/* Values */}

Our Core Values

{val.title}

{val.desc}

))}
{/* CTA */}

Join Us in Transforming German Real Estate

Whether you're looking to buy, rent, or sell a property, Hausgold is here to make the process simple, secure, and stress-free.

); }; export default About;
